scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && $npm_package_config_bin/hc app pack dna/workdir_dashboard -o artifacts/place.happ && cp artifacts/place.happ electron/bin/place.happ && npm run hash-zome
scripts.build:webapp: npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run build -w webapp
scripts.build:chaperone-mainnet: npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run build:webapp-chaperone && PLACE_CHAPERONE_SERVER_URL='https://devnet-chaperone.holo.host' npm run package -w place-chaperone
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w webcomponents && npm t -w tests
scripts.prepare-test: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ && bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w webcomponents
scripts.devtest: npm run prepare-test && npm run build -w webapp && npm run start
scripts.devtest:we: npm run prepare-test && npm run dist:webapp && npm run devtest -w we-applet
scripts.devtest:electron: npm run dist:webapp && npm run build -w electron && BUILD_MODE='dev' npm run start -w electron
scripts.prodtest: npm run prepare-test && npm run dist -w webapp && npm run start
scripts.prodtest:electron: npm run prepare-test && npm run dist -w webapp && npm run start -w electron
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate artifacts/place.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a place network mem
scripts.start:happ-proxied: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate artifacts/place.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a place network --bootstrap https://bootstrap.holo.host/ webrtc wss://signal.holo.host
scripts.start:chaperone: cross-env HC_PORT=33735 ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place-chaperone"
scripts.start: cross-env HC_PORT=33735 ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start:agent-proxied: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run start:happ-proxied" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start:agent:playground: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w place"
scripts.start-proxied: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @place/elements && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ-proxied" "npm run start -w place"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start"
scripts.network-proxied: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent-proxied"
scripts.network-playground: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent:playground"
scripts.start:launcher: echo pass | hc-launch --piped -n 1 artifacts/place.webhapp network mem
scripts.package:webapp: rm -rf artifacts/place-webapp-ui.zip && cd webapp/dist && bestzip ../../artifacts/place-webapp-ui.zip * && cd ../.. && $npm_package_config_bin/hc web-app pack webapp/webhapp.workdir -o artifacts/place.webhapp
scripts.package:we-applet: rm -rf artifacts/place-we_applet-ui.zip && cd we-applet/dist && bestzip ../../artifacts/place-we_applet-ui.zip * && cd ../.. && $npm_package_config_bin/hc web-app pack we-applet/webhapp.workdir -o artifacts/place-we_applet.webhapp
scripts.dist:webapp: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run dist -w webapp && npm run package:webapp
scripts.dist:we: npm run package:webapp && npm run package:we-applet
scripts.dist:electron: bash submodules/hc-prebuilt/copy-binaries.sh electron/bin && npm run dist:build -w electron
scripts.dl-test-release: rm -rf release & mkdir -p release & gh release download manual-release -D release -R lightningrodlabs/place
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:agents & npm run clean:npm & npm run clean
